From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To use an interface for TFTP booting, use the **ip tftp boot-interface** command in global configuration mode. To disable this configuration, use the **no** form of this command.

ParaDef.Info: The type of the interface to be used. You can choose from a list of interfaces.
The related interface number. Each interface has a related range of numbers. For example, the Virtual Multipoint Interface has a range of interface numbers from 1 to 2147483647.
